text: This article is a list of franchises by the American animated studio Warner Bros. Animation, which is part of the Warner Bros. Television division of Warner Bros. Entertainment, owned by Warner Bros. Discovery. This includes animated feature films, shorts, specials, and television series. == Looney Tunes and Merrie Melodies == === Films === # Title Release Dates Notes 1 Original Looney Tunes/Merrie Melodies Shorts April 19, 1930 – July 26, 1969 (original) November 20, 1987 – June 10, 2014 (revival) 2 The Bugs Bunny/Road Runner Movie September 14, 1979 3 The Looney Looney Looney Bugs Bunny Movie November 20, 1981 4 Bugs Bunny's 3rd Movie: 1001 Rabbit Tales November 19, 1982 5 Daffy Duck's Fantastic Island August 5, 1983 6 Daffy Duck's Quackbusters September 24, 1988 7 Space Jam November 15, 1996 8 Looney Tunes: Back in Action November 14, 2003 9 Space Jam: A New Legacy July 16, 2021 10 The Day the Earth Blew Up: A Looney Tunes Movie October 19, 2024 11 Coyote vs. Acme Unreleased ==== TV Series ==== # Title Release Date Notes 1 The Bugs Bunny Show 1960–2000 2 The Porky Pig Show 1964–1967 3 Merrie Melodies with Bugs Bunny & Friends 1990–1994 4 Tiny Toon Adventures 1990–1992 5 Taz-Mania 1991–1995 6 The Plucky Duck Show 1992 Spin-off of Tiny Toon Adventures. 7 The Sylvester & Tweety Mysteries 1995–2002 8 Bugs 'n' Daffy 1995–1998 9 Pinky, Elmyra & the Brain 1998–1999 Spin-off of Tiny Toon Adventures and Animaniacs. 10 Baby Looney Tunes 2002–2005 11 Duck Dodgers 2003–2005 12 Loonatics Unleashed 2005–2007 13 The Looney Tunes Show 2011–2013 14 New Looney Tunes 2015–2020 Formerly known as Wabbit: A Looney Tunes Production (or Bugs! in other countries) during season 1. 15 Looney Tunes Cartoons 2020–2023 16 Bugs Bunny Builders 2022–present 17 Tiny Toons Looniversity 2023–present Revival of the original 1990 animated series. == DC Comics == # Titles Release Date Notes 1 Batman: The Animated Series 1992–1995 First installment of the DC Animated Universe. 2 Batman: Mask of the Phantasm December 25, 1993 Theatrical Movie 3 Superman: The Animated Series 1996–2000 Second installment of the DC Animated Universe. 4 The New Batman Adventures 1997–1999 Sequel to Batman: The Animated Series. 5 Batman Beyond 1999–2001 Sequel to The New Batman Adventures. 6 Static Shock 2000–2004 7 The Zeta Project 2001–2002 Spin-off of Batman Beyond. 8 Justice League 2001–2004 9 Teen Titans 2003–2006 10 Justice League Unlimited 2004–2006 Sequel to Justice League. Final series of the DC Animated Universe. 11 The Batman 2004–2008 12 Krypto the Superdog 2005–2006 13 Legion of Super Heroes 2006–2008 14 Batman: The Brave and the Bold 2008–2011 15 Mad 2010–2013 16 Young Justice 2010–2022 17 Green Lantern: The Animated Series 2011–2013 18 DC Nation Shorts 2011–2014 19 Teen Titans Go! 2013–present 20 Beware the Batman 2013–2014 21 Justice League: Gods and Monsters Chronicles 2015 22 Vixen 2015–2016 23 Justice League Action 2016–2018 24 Freedom Fighters: The Ray 2017–2018 25 Constantine: City of Demons 2018–2019 26 DC Super Hero Girls 2015–2018 (Original Run) 2019–2021 (Rivival) Reboot of the original 2015 web series of the same name. 27 Teen Titans Go! To the Movies July 27, 2018 Theatrical Movie 28 Harley Quinn 2019–present 29 Deathstroke: Knights & Dragons 2020 30 Aquaman: King of Atlantis 2021 Miniseries 31 DC League of Super-Pets July 29, 2022 Theatrical Movie 32 Batwheels 2022–present 33 Batman: The Doom That Came to Gotham March 28, 2023 33 My Adventures with Superman 2023–present 34 Merry Little Batman December 8, 2023 35 Kite Man: Hell Yeah! 2024–present 36 Batman: Caped Crusader 37 Creature Commandos TBA == Animaniacs == # Title Release Date Notes 1 Animaniacs 1993–1998 2 Freakazoid! 1995–1997 3 Pinky and the Brain 1995–1998 Spin-off of Animaniacs. 4 Pinky, Elmyra & the Brain 1998–1999 Spin-off of Tiny Toon Adventures and Animaniacs. 5 Animaniacs 2020–2023 Revival of the original 1993 animated series. == Scooby-Doo == # Title Release Date Notes 1 What's New, Scooby-Doo? 2002–2006 2 Shaggy & Scooby-Doo Get a Clue! 2006–2008 3 Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated 2010–2013 4 Be Cool, Scooby-Doo! 2015–2018 5 “Scoobynatural” March 29, 2018 Supernatural episode 6 Scooby-Doo and Guess Who? 2019–2021 7 Scoob! May 15, 2020 Theatrical Movie 8 Velma 2023–2024 == Tom and Jerry == # Title Release Date Notes 1 Tom and Jerry Tales 2006–2008 2 The Tom and Jerry Show 2014–2021 3 Tom and Jerry Special Shorts 2021 4 Tom & Jerry February 26, 2021 Theatrical movie 5 “Tom and Jerry in New York” 2021 6 Tom and Jerry Singapore 2023 Singaporean-Indian- American co-production 8 The Tom and Jerry Next Door 2025 9 The Droopy Show 2026 Canadian-Irish-American co-production 10 Tom and Jerry Toons 2026-2028 YouTube series 11 Untitled Tom and Jerry film 2027 Theatrical film == Osmosis Jones == # Title Release Date Notes 1 Osmosis Jones August 10, 2001 Theatrical Movie 2 Ozzy & Drix 2002–2004 Spin-off of Osmosis Jones. == The Lego Movie (2014-2020) == # Title Release Date Notes 1 The Lego Movie February 7, 2014 Theatrical Movie 2 The Lego Batman Movie February 10, 2017 3 The Lego Ninjago Movie September 22, 2017 4 Unikitty! 2017–2020 Spin-off of The Lego Movie. 5 The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part February 8, 2019 Theatrical Movie == Hanna- Barbera == # Title Release Date Notes 1 Wacky Races 2017–2019 Reboot of the original 1968 animated series. 2 Jellystone! 2021–present 3 Yabba Dabba Dinosaurs 2021–2022 Spin-off of The Flintstones. == ThunderCats == # Title Release Date Notes 1 ThunderCats 2011–2012 2 ThunderCats Roar 2020 Category:Lists
title: List of Warner Bros. Animation franchises
